ing: 1 fluid ounce Cointreau or other orange liqueur
des: "Great martini or cosmo depending where you live!  I use Ciroc vodka which isn't like any other vodka because it is distilled from fine French grapes.  You can actually taste the grape in the vodka!"
ins: Pour the vodka, Cointreau, and grape juice into a cocktail shaker over ice. Cover, and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted. Strain into a chilled martini glasses to serve.
